name: Shelf Space [LDJAM 42]
description:
Shelf Space is my Ludum Dare 42 compo entry. All assets were created within the 48 hour time limit.

Shelf Space is a game where you are placed in an infinite void and are given a simple task: put books on a shelf. 

Put as many books on the shelf as you can in 3:00 minutes, be forewarned the books keep coming and you are quickly RUNNING OUT OF SPACE! The books also have a fussy bit of physics to them, you'll need to learn their quirks to be effective at putting books up on a shelf. 

Put your high score in your comment!

--Instructions--

WASD to move, shift to run.

Space to jump.

Mouse-click to pick up or drop a book.
